## What does this PR do?

Brief description of the change.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New operation or feature
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Infrastructure / tooling

## Mathematical correctness

If this PR implements or modifies a mathematical operation:

- [ ] The operation is defined precisely in a comment with a reference marked [VERIFY]
- [ ] Unit tests cover the basic algebraic properties (associativity, anticommutativity, etc.)
- [ ] Edge cases are tested (zero multivector, scalar-only, pseudoscalar)

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows comment conventions in CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`cargo test`)
- [ ] No new clippy warnings (`cargo clippy`)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated under [Unreleased]
- [ ] Citations marked [VERIFY] if added
